cause.description:
Autism is a disease where children who are very bright but have difficulty with social skills, and sometimes balance and other sensory problems.
1. This is a very serious problem and it's on the rise
2. more children have this disease than ever before
3. please help me do something about this!
cause.mission: our mission is to improve the lives of children who have autism and to find a cure for this disease
cause.name: CAN (Cure Autism Now!)
